casebody.data:
MIGUEL DE ALDAMA, Appellant, v. FRANCIS F. LASALA, Respondent.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., Speir and Russell, JJ.

Decided November 22, 1830. This is an appeal from a judgment, entered upon the report of a referee, in favor of the defendant, and involves only questions of fact. Horace Secor, Jr., for appellant. Starr & Hooker, for respondent. Per Curiam.

Judgment affirmed, with costs.
